message:
Dear {firstName},
 {timeGreeting}. We hope you are enjoying your stay at {companyName}. If you have any questions don't hesitate to ask.

Howdy {firstName},
We hope you are having a rootin tootin great time at {companyName}. Feel free to ride our horses around {cityName}.

{firstName},
We regret to inform you that you must vacate room {roomNumber}. You have been banned from every {companyName} in the world.
